column1:
I have been helping the folks at Manning put together an initial set of AI/ML "liveProjects". Really excited to see these go out and hear that they are being well received.

https://lnkd.in/gCF_svP

Deno is a simple, modern and secure runtime for JavaScript and TypeScript that uses V8 and is built in Rust. Don't panic though, Node isn't going anywhere.
